on reading compounds: 灯【トウ】light, lamp, counter for electric lights
消灯【ショウトウ】putting out the light, switching off the light
提灯【チョウチン】paper lantern, Chinese lantern, Japanese lantern
kun reading compounds: 灯涼し【ひすずし】coolness of distant twinkling lights (on a summer night)
灯す【ともす】to light (a candle, lamp, etc.), to turn on (a light)
